mods.note: 10 & M _ IWBEX 23249 TO . 1918 . ROUTES IN PERSIA. VOL. III. PART II. GENERAL STAFF, INDIA April, 1918. SIMLA; PRINTED AT THE GOVERNMENT MONOTYPE PRESS« - •

location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'INDEX TO ROUTES IN PERSIA. VOL. III. PART II.'

physicalDescription.extent: Foliation: the foliation sequence commences at the front cover with 1 and terminates at the last folio with 29; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio. Pagination: the volume also contains an original printed pagination sequence.

mods.abstract: The volume is a Government of India official publication entitled Index to Routes in Persia Volume III, Part II. General Staff India(Simla: Government Monotype Press, 1918).The volume consists of an index to place names.
